Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs)
1. How does the Color Picker Extension work?
Our extension features an intuitive eyedropper tool that lets you click on any element or image in your browser to pick its color. Codes are instantly displayed in Hex, RGB, and HSL formats.

2. Can I save my picked colors?
Yes! Your recently picked colors are saved in the built-in Color History so you can easily reuse them in future projects.

3. Does it support images?
Absolutely! Use the Image Color Identifier to extract colors from any image displayed on a webpage.

4. Is this extension free?
Yes, the Color Picker Chrome Extension is completely free to download and use with no hidden costs.
